title: Vietnam Builder Hub: 24/7 Co-working and Incubation Space
summary: Cardano Vietnam devs work in isolation, lacking a physical hub and mentorship to build team. This disconnect leads to high project abandonment and few Mainnet dApps.
solution: Build a 24/7 Co-working Hub providing free workspace, expert mentorship, and milestone-based grants to ensure 5 high-quality projects reach Mainnet network.
proposer_relevant_experience:
**1\. Do Hoang Trung \- Project Lead**

GitHub: [https://github\.com/hoangtrung192](https://github.com/hoangtrung192)

Bio/Experience:

- Project management: Over 2 years of experience leading tech events, including participating Hackathons (Hackathon 2025 Organizer) and developer bootcamps. Proven track record in team leadership and cross-functional coordination.
- Technical expertise: A full-stack and blockchain developer proficient in Haskell and Aiken for Cardano smart contracts, as well as C/C++, Java, SQL, and TypeScript. Experienced with Mesh.js SDK for dApp integration.
- Blockchain insight: Deep understanding of DeFi architecture, decentralized governance models, and Tokenomics design.
- Catalyst experience: Strong capability in proposal writing and fund management.

Responsibilities:

- Overall project coordination and legal/budget accountability (60,000 ADA).
- Submitting monthly Proof of Achievement (PoA) and Close-out reports to Catalyst.
- Overseeing the quality assurance (QA) process for the 5 incubated Mainnet projects.

**2\. Bui Huong Giang \- Community Manager**

X [https://x\.com/ebegings/](https://x.com/ebegings/:)

Bio/Experience:

- Community building: Expert in building developer communities with an extensive network of Senior Developers, Vendors, and Tech Enterprises in Vietnam.
- Event logistics: Experienced in operating end-to-end logistics for tech events ranging from 50-100 participants.
- Partnership Management: Strong background in B2B partnership and stakeholder management within the local tech ecosystem.

Responsibilities:

- Managing daily Hub operations (Member onboarding, Check-in/out, facility support).
- Leading the logistics and organization for 8 Technical Workshops and the final Demo Day.
- Managing social media channels and executing the recruitment campaign for Hub members.

**3\. Phung Nguyen Trong An \- Blockchain Developer**

LinkedIn: [https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/tr%E1%BB%8Dng\-an\-664950392/?utm\_source=share\_via&utm\_content=profile&utm\_medium=member\_android](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tr%E1%BB%8Dng-an-664950392/?utm_source=share_via&utm_content=profile&utm_medium=member_android)

GitHub: [https://github\.com/trongsanggvm06](https://github.com/trongsanggvm06)

X: [https://x\.com/AnTrong5426?t=jeDOSsJ\_8DqCQPm6PCDaFw&s=09](https://x.com/AnTrong5426?t=jeDOSsJ_8DqCQPm6PCDaFw&s=09)

Experience:

- Cardano specialist: Experienced Blockchain Developer specializing in Aiken and Plutus.
- Track record: Has successfully deployed products to Mainnet and actively contributes to open source repositories in the Cardano ecosystem.

Responsibilities:

- Designing the curriculum and serving as the primary instructor for Technical Workshops.
- Conducting Code Reviews and providing System Architecture consultancy for incubated teams.
- Validating technical milestones to authorize the release of Builder Bounties/Grants.

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Who you’re targeting, how you’ll reach them, and why this matters for Cardano?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Target Audience:

- Core builders: Haskell/Plutus/Aiken/Marlowe developers seeking teams.
- University talent: Students researching and developing applications on Cardano.
- Product owners: Individuals with business ideas seeking technical co-founders.

Engagement Strategy:

We reach them through Phase 1 of our transformation funnel: Organizing open workshops to attract 100 members, from which we filter down to 10-15 potential teams committed to working physically at the Hub.

Importance to Cardano:

Vietnam already has many education projects but lacks an environment for building real-world projects. This project fills that gap by connecting Coders with Business Builders, converting resources from "learning" to "doing" and launching actual products.

sub_fields.title: Provide a list of key activities of your project:
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
- Infrastructure setup: Providing free open co-working space equipped with high-speed internet and whiteboards for coding.
- Team Selection: Conducting open workshops to select 10-15 committed teams.
- Weekly Community Calls: Hosting weekly sessions where teams must demo real progress (lines of code, UI/UX updates) instead of passive meetups.
- On-site mentorship: Connecting teams with senior devs/experts to debug technical issues (Aiken/Haskell) immediately, minimizing downtime.
- Milestone-based incentives: Managing the budget to award bounties, releasing funds only upon verified milestones (e.g., successful deployment to pre-production testnet).
- Mainnet launch: Organizing a Demo Day and launching the 5 best projects on Mainnet (Phase 3).

sub_fields.title: What are your success metrics?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
- Output quality: 5 Projects successfully deployed on mainnet (phase 3).
- Team formation: 10-15 potential teams formed and committed to working at the Hub.
- Community engagement: 100+ members attracted via open workshops (phase 1).
- Development progress: Regular weekly real-time demos of code and UI/UX updates during Community Calls.
- Comprehensive support: Completion of 4 months of intensive support in technology, legal, and tokenomics (phase 2).

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
Vietnam is a hotspot for Blockchain innovation, yet Cardano developers operate in fragmented silos. The absence of a dedicated physical workspace hinders brainstorming, co-founder matching, and technical troubleshooting. In reality, the ecosystem has not effectively utilized this solution:

Isolation: Developers often work alone, lacking immediate feedback on complex technical issues (Aiken/Haskell/Plutus).

Lack of accountability: Without positive peer pressure and commitment, many projects stall at the ideation phase or are abandoned halfway.

Skill gap: There is a disconnect between Coders and Business Builders, preventing the creation of complete, market-ready products.

**The Solution: VN Cardano Builder Hub**

Physical infrastructure:

Free open co-working space for teams that pass the selection round.

Fully equipped with high-speed internet, workstations, and whiteboards for coding and architecture design.

Recurring operations:

Weekly Community Call: Instead of passive meetups, we host active weekly calls at the end of the week. Teams must demo real progress (lines of code, UI/UX updates, ecosystem highlights) to the community and mentors.

Mentorship: Direct connection with experienced senior devs, experts, and enterprises for on-the-spot technical debugging, minimizing project downtime.

Incentive mechanism:

A portion of the budget is allocated for bounties to reward active teams or early MVP completion. Funds are released only when teams achieve specific milestones (,successful deployment to pre-production testnet). This transforms the Hub into a healthy competitive environment.

**Transformation Process:**

- Phase 1: Attract 100 members via open workshops to filter and select 10-15 potential teams committed to working at the Hub.
- Phase 2: Provide comprehensive support in Technology, Legal, and Tokenomics over 4 months.
- Phase 3: Host a Demo Day and launch the 5 best projects on Mainnet.

**Beneficiaries:**

Core builders: Haskell/Plutus/Aiken/Marlowe devs seeking teams.

University talent: Students researching and developing applications on Cardano.

Product owners: Individuals with business ideas seeking technical co-founders.

**Unique Value Proposition:**

Here, builders are gathered among like-minded individuals speaking the same programming language. This synergy accelerates product development speed significantly compared to working in isolation from home.

**Why is this important for Cardano?**

In reality, while Vietnam has seen many successful education and course-based projects, there is a distinct lack of environments for real-world project execution. Therefore, the success of this project will help attract a large wave of Blockchain developers to actively participate and build within the Cardano ecosystem.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
**1\. Strategic Value for the Cardano Ecosystem:**

The VN Builder Hub project addresses the "last-mile product delivery" challenge for the Cardano ecosystem in Vietnam:

- Conversion: Vietnam boasts a large pool of developers interested in Blockchain, but the conversion rate to Cardano Devs remains low due to language barriers (Haskell) and the lack of a practical environment. This Hub acts as a catalyst to bridge that gap.
- Physical anchor: Establishing a physical Hub in Southeast Asia serves as a destination where VCs and enterprise partners can scout for potential Cardano project teams.
- On-chain growth: The ultimate goal is not just code, but live dApps on Mainnet. 5 successful projects will generate new users and continuous transaction volume for the Cardano network long after the project concludes.

**2\. Measurement and KPIs:**

We commit to measuring success via specific Quantitative and Qualitative metrics over the 6-month period:

**_Quantitative Metrics:_**

- 5 mainnet projects: This is the most critical KPI. We commit to incubating at least 5 projects that complete their MVP and deploy to the network.
- 100 active builders: Attracting 100 developers to participate in the Hub ecosystem.
- 12 intensive events: Organizing 12 Technical Workshops.
- 300+ GitHub commits: Tracking the coding activity of projects within the Hub to ensure real work is being delivered.

**_Qualitative Metrics:_**

- The success rate of individual members finding Co-founders or forming complete teams at the Hub.
- The measurable improvement of Developer skills, moving from zero knowledge of Plutus/Aiken to being capable of deploying Smart Contracts.
- The volume of educational videos/documentation created from the workshops.

**Sharing Outputs & Opportunities:**

- The Hub playbook: We will document the entire Hub operational process (setup, workshop organization, bounty management) and share it publicly. Cardano communities in other countries can replicate this model.
- Monthly showcases: Every month, projects within the Hub will conduct short recorded demos for the global community to track progress.
- Final demo day: A major concluding event where the top 5 projects will pitch to investors and the community. This footage will be widely promoted across Cardano media channels (Twitter, Telegram, Youtube).

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
**1\. Proven track record and team capability:**

Our team consists of active members with years of contribution to the Cardano Vietnam community, specializing in organizing and operating events within the Blockchain ecosystem. We possess the ideal skill set to run this Hub model:

- Has 3 years of project management experience and has successfully participated in deploying numerous workshops, hackathons, and bootcamps. Additionally, possesses years of hands-on programming experience on Cardano.
- Experienced in organizing Tech events and managing developer communities in Vietnam. Holds a strong network of relationships with local vendors and Senior Developers.

**2\. Feasibility validation \(Why this project will succeed\):**

Real market demand: We conducted a preliminary survey within local developer groups. Currently, we have a waitlist of over 20 developers and 3 potential startup teams ready to join the Hub immediately upon opening.

Low-Risk Infrastructure: Instead of building a new office (which entails high cost and risk), we have established a strategic partnership with a reputable Co-working Space provider. This allows us to activate the workspace specifically for the 4-month intensive incubation phase, avoiding unnecessary long-term lease liabilities.

**3\. Financial transparency and trust:**

To ensure the 60,000 ADA is utilized correctly, we implement strict financial controls:

Multi-sig wallet: All project funds will be secured in a 2-of-3 Multi-sig wallet to prevent unauthorized spending or single points of failure.

Milestone-based Disbursement:

Operational costs: Disbursed monthly based on actual invoices.

Builder incentives: Disbursed only when teams achieve verified milestones (Testnet deployment) with clear on-chain proof.

Open Accounting: A public Google Sheet tracking every transaction (Time, TxHash, Purpose, Amount) will be updated weekly for community auditing.

**4\. Risk management:**

- Volatility risk: Should the ADA price drop significantly, we will prioritize protecting the Builder Incentives budget (the core value driver) and cut non-essential Logistics/Marketing costs.
- Participation risk: In cases where physical attendance is restricted (due to weather or health concerns), we have a contingency plan ready to switch all workshops to Discord/Zoom immediately, ensuring the implementation progress remains uninterrupted.

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
**Infrastructure** (20%): 12,000 ADA

Co-working Space Rental (4 Months): 12,000 ADA.

Calculation: 3,000 ADA/month x 4 months.

Details: Renting a suitable co-working space including electricity, water, internet, and necessary amenities. The space is functionally divided into 2 zones: a dedicated Team Working Zone and an Event/Workshop Zone.

**Operations Team** (23%): 14,000 ADA

Operations Personnel: 14,000 ADA.

Details: Compensation for the core team responsible for operations management, logistics coordination, and project supervision throughout the lifecycle.

**Education and Mentoring** (15%): 9,000 ADA

Expert Mentorship: 9,000 ADA.

Calculation: 2,250 ADA/month x 4 months.

Details: Remuneration for Blockchain experts, enterprises, and mentors to conduct weekly 1-on-1 mentoring sessions and code reviews for the incubated teams.

**Builder Incentives** (32%): 19,000 ADA

Grants and Bounties: 19,000 ADA.

Details: Performance-based reward fund. This includes larger awards for teams that successfully deploy to Mainnet and micro-rewards for teams achieving specific incubation milestones. We allocate the largest portion of the budget here to directly support builders.

**Events and Marketing** (10%): 6,000 ADA

Event Logistics: 6,000 ADA.

Details: Costs for equipment rental (audio/visual) and teabreaks (catering) for 8 technical workshops and community gatherings.

**Total budget: 60,000 ADA ~$24,000**

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
1. High capital efficiency:

With a total request of 60,000 ADA, we commit to delivering 5 Mainnet projects. This equates to a capital cost of only 12,000 ADA per project. This is significantly lower than the standard direct funding route, which typically requires 30,000–50,000 ADA for a single individual MVP.

2. Leveraging local cost advantages:

Personnel salaries and venue rentals are calculated based on Vietnamese market rates (which are substantially lower than in the US/EU). This geo-arbitrage allows us to allocate a massive 25% of the total budget (15,000 ADA) directly back to the Builders as incentives, creating the most tangible motivation for development.

3. Zero infrastructure risk:

We have opted for a "Co-working Partnership" model (renting and upgrading existing space) rather than building from scratch. This strategy minimizes initial capital expenditure (CAPEX) and ensures the majority of funds are focused on operational expenditure (OPEX) and human capital development.

4. Volatility management plan:

We are fully aware of ADA price volatility. Should the price drop below $0.35, we will trigger a contingency plan: reducing physical Event costs and shifting to online meetings. However, we strictly commit to protecting the budget for Builder Incentives and Mentoring, as these are the core value drivers of the project.

sub_fields.title: I Agree
sub_fields.description: I confirm that I have read, understand and shall adhere to the [Project Catalyst Platform Terms of Use](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/project-catalyst-platform-terms-of-use), [Project Catalyst Platform Privacy Policy](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/project-catalyst-platform-privacy-policy), [Terms & Conditions](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions), [Fund Rules](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/fund-rules), [Privacy Policy](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/catalyst-fc-privacy-policy). I understand that providing accurate and truthful information is essential for my proposal to remain eligible to participate in the current Fund.
